text: Spirit Lake is a 1961 novel by MacKinlay Kantor. It is set in Iowa during the era of Manifest Destiny, and depicts the epoch through a patchwork of numerous characters, families, and factions.https://books.google.com/books?id=ejNNDwAAQBAJ&dq;=spirit+lake+kantor&source;=gbs_navlinks_s Google Books The book comes to a climax with the Spirit Lake Massacre.https://www.kirkusreviews.com/book-reviews/mackinlay- kantor-11/spirit-lake/ Kirkushttps://archive.org/details/spiritlake00kant Archive ==References== Category:1961 novels Category:Iowa in fiction Category:Novels set in Iowa
title: Spirit Lake (book)
